item.title: 【Singles (lossy)】MP3 - ここから、ここから (Sora yori mo Tooi Basho ED)
item.description:
=================================================================================
Schoolgirl, go to Antarctica!
The ending theme has been released from the TV anime "A Place Farther Than the Universe" that started in January 2018!

★ A completely new original TV animation by the best & strongest creators who worked on the anime "No Game, No Life" series!
A completely new original TV animation presented by the staff who worked on the anime series "No Game, No Life", both of which were big hits in the TV series broadcast in April 2014 and the movie released in July 2017!
From artistic works to exquisite entertainment, creator "Atsuko Ishizuka", who demonstrates outstanding talent in various genres, and the TV anime "Love Live!" series.
From the original to the original, the miracle duo of storyteller "Juki Hanada" who creates a crush as if magic has been applied, and the youth graffiti of high school girls presented by MADHOUSE, one of Japan's leading studios that works on "Overlord" and others!
TV anime broadcast started in January 2018!

★The ending theme of the TV anime "A Place Farther Than the Universe" is in charge of the four main characters played by gorgeous voice actors!
This is a coming-of-age song in which the four main characters of this work, Mari Tamaki (CV: Inori Minase), Hose Kobuchizawa (CV: Kana Hanazawa), Hinata Miyake (CV: Yuka Iguchi), and Yuzuki Shiraishi (CV: Saori Hayami), take a step toward their dreams!

[Contents]
1.TV anime "A place farther than the universe" ending theme "From here, from here"
2. One Step」
3.「 From here, from here" (instrumental)
4. "One Step" (instrumental)

[Story Summary]
My youth begins to move...!
Kimari, aka Mari Tamaki, a girl who wants to start something but is in her second year of high school without being able to take the first step,
meets a girl who is aiming for Antarctica. Even though high school students are told that there is no way they can go to Antarctica, Kimari is moved by the appearance of Hose, who never gives up,
and vows to aim for Antarctica with Hose.

[Main Staff]
◆ Original: Yori ◆ Director: Atsuko Ishizuka ◆ Series composition and script: Juki Hanada ◆ Character design and general animation director: Takahiro Yoshimatsu



◆ Art setting: Akihiro Hirasawa
◆ Art Director: Saho Yamane ◆ Color Design: Harue Ohno ◆ Cinematographer: Hiroki Kawashita ◆ 3D Director: Daisuke Kusaka ◆ Editor: Yoshiko Kimura ◆ Sound Director: Hitoshi Akita





◆ Sound Effects: Tsutomu

◆ Music: Yoshimasa Fujisawa ◆ Music Production: KADOKAWA
◆ Cooperation: Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology / National Institute of Polar Research / Maritime Self-Defense Force / SHIRASE5002 WNI Meteorological Culture Creation Center
◆ Animation production: MADHOUSE

◆ Production: "A place farther than spaceProduction Committee

[Main Cast]
◆ Mari Tamaki: Inori Minase ◆ Hose Kobuchizawa: Kana Hanazawa ◆ Hinata Miyake: Yuka Iguchi ◆ Yuzuki Shiraishi: Saori Hayami



◆ Gin Todo: Mamiko

◆ Kanae Maekawa: Yoko Hikasa ◆ Yumiko Sameshima: Lynn
◆ Megumi Takahashi: Hisako Kanemoto

◆ Rin Tamaki: Kaede
Hondo
(c) YORIMOI PARTNERS
=================================================================================
  • Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 14.3 x 12.7 x 1.2 cm; 80 g
  • Format : MP3 320kbps
  • Number of tracks ‏ : ‎ 4
